revised_title: Freshwater Algae of Kerguelen Island: A Study by Reverend A. E. Eaton and Contributions by P. F. Reinsch
tldr: This article presents a detailed account of the freshwater algae collected by Reverend A. E. Eaton from Kerguelen Island during the Transit of Venus Expeditions in 1874-75. The study, which includes contributions by P. F. Reinsch, provides a comprehensive list of 81 species of freshwater algae, with 28 new species and 3 new genera identified. The findings contribute to the understanding of the diverse plant life and ecosystems on Kerguelen Island.
